alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Tippecanoe; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 1:36AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Fountain, southwestern Tippecanoe and Warren Counties through 215 AM EDT... At 135 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Otterbein to 6 miles northwest of Covington. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and localized flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Williamsport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
